name.japanese: スリラーバーク海賊団

keyMoments.title: General Zombies Annihilated
keyMoments.description: All of the Thriller Bark Pirates' General Zombie forces are instantly defeated by Oars in a single crushing attack.
keyMoments.significance: Major loss of military power for the crew, showing internal chaos as their own creation destroys their forces.

keyMoments.title: Absalom's Horror at Oars' Power
keyMoments.description: Absalom realizes that Oars poses a threat not just to enemies but to Thriller Bark itself and all its inhabitants.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates internal conflict as the crew's ultimate weapon becomes uncontrollable.

goals: Use stolen shadows to create an army of zombies
Defeat the Straw Hat Pirates and steal their shadows
trivia: The Thriller Bark Pirates are unique in that most of their forces are zombies created by Gecko Moria's Kage Kage no Mi powers.
In this episode, the crew experiences internal chaos as their own creation (Oars) destroys their General Zombie forces.
